sys_script_include.description:
simple include to control the visibility of a ui action on a given related list example name of related list is 'u_cmdb_ci_apmflow.u_sending_business_app'
ui action has a condition of RP.isRelatedList()&& new HideAPMsend().validate(RP.getListControl().getControlID())
sys_script_include.name: HideAPMsend

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6fc5a5212f772010473d1e282799b6dc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.HideAPMsend</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>simple include to control the visibility of a ui action on a given related list 
example
name of related list is 'u_cmdb_ci_apmflow.u_sending_business_app'

ui action has a condition of
RP.isRelatedList()&& new HideAPMsend().validate(RP.getListControl().getControlID())
</description><name>HideAPMsend</name><script><![CDATA[var HideAPMsend = Class.create();
HideAPMsend.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    validate: function(a) {

        var listcontrol = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_list_control');
        if (listcontrol.get(a)) {
			return listcontrol.related_list == "c";
        }
        return false;
    },
    type: 'HideAPMsend'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-28 12:34:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>6fc5a5212f772010473d1e282799b6dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HideAPMsend</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6fc5a5212f772010473d1e282799b6dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-28 12:34:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
